name: Countdown Stream Layout
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Modifies the look of the Stream Layout for Countdown. Defaults to a dark them but will be customizable to whatever you want in the future.

List of changes other than coloring:
  • Size of the Numbered Preset buttons. (this fixes the text not being centered)
  • Margin on top of the "Ready" button to be the same as all the other buttons.
  • Centered Icons for item/equipment/quest/mask menus.

Use the "Advanced Style Settings" button below to set custom colors.
additional_info: I may update this to add defining custom colors when installing this stylish in the future.
